com.travelsupermarket.referencedata

Class ReferenceDataApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.dropwizard.Application<ReferenceDataConfiguration>
      • com.travelsupermarket.referencedata.ReferenceDataApplication

  • public class ReferenceDataApplication
extends io.dropwizard.Application<ReferenceDataConfiguration>
    Main class for the Reference Data Service Application. Contains the main method of this Dropwizard application. Initialises the application and registers resources.
